column1: Uchi////I've been hearing rave reviews from all my friends about how great this place is....i maybe it was the hype and build up - I just don't see what all the fuss is about. Yes
column4: the waiters can talk ad nauseum about hints on elderberry in the wine and name drop local growers....but at the end of the meal...all I wanted was a to Â taste a delicious piece of raw fish. If you like sushi rolls
column5: you will probably love this place. If you love raw fish....you'll probably walk out scratching your head as I did.
